title: Ticket #919: RFE: Schedd renew all leases on graceful shutdown
description: When the Schedd is gracefully shutdown, it should try and renew leases for running jobs. In the case of a graceful shutdown for an upgrade this will reduce the likelihood that jobs may be terminated before the Schedd can be restarted.
